title: Cancer. Oh, Crap.
description:
"Cancer. Oh, Crap."
 is a work of creative nonfiction inspired by the experience of its author, John Powers III. It is his story of the diagnosis of, and treatment for AML (Acute Myelogenous Leukemia). Cancer treatment including blood and platelet transfusions,chemotherapy, consolidation chemotherapy and resulting nadir issues are explored.This book will serve to help others navigate the nightmare that is cancer, and the author's sense of humor helps to make this dreary subject palatable. It has been described as
 "a powerful story with a great view into the world of cancer treatment."
The foreword is a thought-provoking insight of cancer medicine written by renowned Hematology and Medical Oncology practitioner Frank Rodriguez, M.D. of Florida Cancer Specialists.
author: John J. Powers III
